author: Abdallah Alawieh
comment: This game is so addictive! I cant get off my hands from the mobile bcz of this game! Its so cool! But maibe the price of the final balls must be a little bit more cheap .. But still, i will rate five stars bcz i really love these fun and hard games u make 👌! Also there is one bug : today i saw about 3 invisible patforms .
title: Another Great game from Ketchapp! 👍.

author: Kawaii Muffin
comment: Too many ads, other than that it's fine. If your going to dislike or give it 1 star, please don't try and change others opinion. BTW,  I personally think it's fun to try and beat your high score. Very good app, deserves 5 stars!! AMAZING. I can see you have put a lot of effort and that's amazing. If you got this far reading, you are an amazing person  who cares about others. Goodbye, have a nice and wonderful day! :)
title: Amazing, just ads.. xD

author: Flia Lopez-Castilla
comment: It is so adicting because when you want to buy a ball that is 100 gems you just can not stop playing the game. The rounds go by prety fast because if you do not get the hang of it you might never get a good high score. But here is a hint of getting a good high score go fast. If your high score is 50 or up you got a good high score. But be careful it could make you die when the platform changes. It only changes when you pass 50. So it changes from 50 to 100 to 150 to 200 and so on you get it. It is so much f
title: Adictive

author: John Wright
comment: Where some I want to keep trying. This one not so much. More it doesn't make me want to buy it. Because I'm one that doesn't mind buying my games. I absolutely hate ads. And I haven't played enough to see if I like it. But the adds really makes me not want to find out. The adds really destroys any enjoyment of the game or to get into it at all. I know the developer has to make money. As I said I buy 95% of my games. But if the ads make to Uninstaller before you want to buy it. What's the point!
title: Another of there games I such at.

author: MissBriannaDeLeon
comment: The game is fun and very addictive. The only thing that made me rate it 4/5 is the fact that there are multiple ads. Not to many to make me wanna delete the app but enough that It gets kinda aggravating. They can be exited out hough cause none of them are videos.
title: Addictive

author: scrollin' youtube
comment: There's to many ads .. pop here pop there ads everywhere! But if there are not so many ads I'll give it a 5star. If you have very small amount of patience I mean literally I almost threw my phone in irritation, luckily I was able to relax and play the game again and again. So yeah that's all very nice game takes a lot of patience. Just remove the ads it isn't helping😊
title: I liked it but..

author: John Smith
comment: So far my highest score is 79 and I'm trying to get at least 100. Please make more games like this. It takes up some of my time and it works your brain. Everyone should try this if you have really good hand eye coordination. But maybe you could start changing the color of the walls before you get to 50 just to make it a little better.
title: Addictive

author: Tori Thornton
comment: ZigZag is a very well put together game. I personally love it, however you need patience! Give it a couple days and you'll be doing an amazing! All of those who say the game is horrible, try to give it another try. It is quite hard when you start, and if your an impatient person, the game is not for you. Try something else like Snake.Io, Color Switch, Twist, Smash Hit, and Stack. They are just as fun and addictive!
title: Loved it! How about you? Yup, I'm talking to you, i know your reading this!

author: 3girls SWAG
comment: It's too addictive it won't let me eat I can't sleep it's stealing my life man! Anyway it was a really great game and I'm uninstalling it with high score of 110! Thank you! Updated Version: So I reinstalled it......God help me please!!Updated Version: Omg my highest score Is 185 dream come true!! Took me 2 day strait my fingers are falling off! Woohoo so fun!
title: Addictive

author: vidit chauhan
comment: This game is so much fun. I like it. Whenever I get bore I try my hands on this app. More than 500 is easily achievable but after that it becomes hard and harder. I scored 1072 once, now even I can't get close to 1000. Trying to break my record only then I will take rest. Thanks to developers.
title: My highest score 1072

author: Red
comment: Awesome game don't get  how you are supposed to know how to play. But uhh go with the flow. Could make  a game character so it's looks more fun. The only reason I got this game was because I was bored  needed a new play of games.  This game LOOKED bad just clicked it though.  The makers need to add  more stlye but I would recommend this game mainly ages five and over

author: Mitesh Malaiya
comment: I don't know I downloaded a game app or an ad package...I mean seriously, these many ads...it ruins  the entire game experience. I complete every round followed by an ad. They even break in between the round. One doesn't get to see these many ads even in the television. Those ads are too eager to pop-up that they even don't wait for the results to be displayed. Just control your ad-love(THE DEVELOPERS) or otherwise the game is one of the addictive ones!! YEAH
title: AD MAD SAD...!!!

author: Brett F
comment: I don't mind ads in free games, that makes sense. What doesnt make sense is when the ads disrupt the gameplay. Banner ads at the bottom of the screen pop up, and cause input lag which makes your ball go over the edge. This didn't happen when I played this game a year ago.
title: Used to be a great game, but now...

author: Ice Girl
comment: Hate it. It is like solo hard like my best score is 1 and I've tried like zoo hard! I JUST WISH THE WOULD THIS GAME AS EASY AS DANCING LINE. Which is a really good game. SO PLEASE TRY TO RASY UP THE CONTROLS PLEASE

author: Raphael Jogezai
comment: The game itself is a bomb! Love it and always will but you need to keep on bringing new stuff on the table. There is a need of more content as once you make a high score and purchase all of the balls there is really nothing to spend those gems on so at least keep bringing updates for new awesome balls.
title: More content

author: haris moin
comment: A very good game indeed even a much addictive one as I have found. The most craziest thing is that ,I have jst downloaded this app a few moments before and my whole battery is drained up in playing this.😁
title: Highly Addictive

author: Aubrey Monckton
comment: Delete minecraft right now! When I started playing I thought the game was lame. I didn't get it, tapping the screen to move directions. But then I got the high score of 30 taps. Tehn I got excited and it got addicting. Tehn I got 33 as the high score and then 43, and now 65. This game is so awsome, complex, and adicting! This game rocks!!

author: Casey Derrick
comment: Its a really good game, really addictive. The only think that could be changed is when the added come up half way through the game and you die. Also should be more than just one level and also put in nore acheivments. But apart from that its a really good game would recomend it.
title: I love it!

author: Soumya Subhra Bhowmik
comment: Everytime I pass 50 or its multiples,the color of the board changes which makes me lose my concentration. The game's already quite difficult as it is,so please do away with the distractions. A pretty absorbing game otherwise.
title: The color change of the board sucks

author: Abhishek Chakraborty
comment: The game is very addictive. Initially it is a bit harder to score even a hundred. However, as you keep playing again and again, you start to score higher. My high score is currently 279. I have one issue for the developer. The score sync does not work correctly. My high score was made while I wasn't connected to the Internet, as a result of which it didn't get synced to my profile. My online profile still has a score of 246. Deducted a star just for that.
title: Very addictive

author: James S
comment: Doesn't sync any high scores you get while not connected to the internet. Plus, in order for it to update your high score, you have to beat your old one... The one that didn't sync in the first place.
title: A nice simplistic game, but has problems with syncing

author: 101 Damnations
comment: Everything doesn't play out as you expect it too. In your head you're like, "Oh this is gonna be easy," but then when you play it for a first time you start getting frustrated at how challenging the game is. One wrong turn and you're out. It'll last you a while, don't worry. Its not a waste of your time. I suggest you download it.
title: Its super cool

author: Taylor Britt
comment: I haven't even played this yet but it looks like a total rip off of the game Dancing Line by Cheetah Mobile. If you want a 4.8 rather than 4.1 star game, check out Dancing Line. It's a very fun, addicting game with amazing music.

author: Caitlin Brown
comment: This game makes me so mad, but in a good way. It's challenging and frustrates me but it doesn't get boring. Works great on my phone but not at all on my kindle. The only thing is that I can't get to the stats or trophies, the buttons won't work. But other than that I love it! It's addicting.
title: Challenging for sure

author: kathy gillgren
comment: I think the game is way to hard would if there are people with mental problems and want to play a game called zig zag and play it and fail and think that they are stupid. Do u rely want that to happen u should make it were u can choose easy normal hard or medium.
title: Hate this game

author: Katlynne Messersmith
comment: It's addicting. I sorta like it. I HATE the adds! The game cliches and opp there's an add! I can never beat the high score because it's add add add. Also sometimes my game will just have a giant space and makes me loose because there is no were for the ball to go.
title: Difficult

author: Melissa Dodson
comment: I like this game ,it's challenging but way too many ads, it's annoying. Especially for how hard it is  , the speed of the ball should be a little slower and speed up as you progress through the game. I would continue to play, but I'm uninstalling. Sorry
title: Too many adds

author: KrSgaming HD
comment: The point the track changes colour, if it is changing to either black or white, ur done screwed since the color for the shadow of the track is black and the background color is white. These 2 colour really is a pain and also unfairly unlucky to those who gets it all of a sudden. This issue needs to be fix
title: Fun. But......

author: Zhalia Martin
comment: I loved this game. But advertisements keep popping up when I fall off. And I'm getting sick and tired of these advertisements because they slow down the game, the game will stop for 5 seconds and continue and I fall off because it stopped, and TOO MUCH LAG!!!! I will uninstall this game until you get rid of the advertisements. I am never paying to get rid of advertisements, because I could be doing something better with the money instead of waste it to get rid of advertisements.
title: Advertisements = Terrible

author: TT PiPi
comment: Game itself is great. It was super smooth and didn't lag at all on iPhones, but both of my LG devices don't like this game at all. it is smooth for about 10 seconds, then starts to slow down. The game goes into a laggy slomo version of the game and switches between this and running smoothly. I have an LG G4 and an LG Gpad 8.3
title: Laggy

author: Brenna Walsh
comment: With full internet connection, it takes its time bringing up the sign in for  Google. It also lags so bad for days at a time. I can't play when this happens because it makes me fall off the edge when it doesn't register I tapped. Please fix the performance
title: Lags and slow to start

author: Mehul Chauhan
comment: It's theme is more than better. But it has no levels. And by just starting you will get same difficulty as a whole. That is one disadvantage of this game. You won't clear the pretty distance in small fraction of time.
title: Ok

author: Charutha Radhakrishnan
comment: This game is so good from every point of view! Once you start playing, you can't stop, because you're just so motivated into beating your high score! It has the perfect amount of difficulty, and it also has brilliant graphics, even better than HD! I would definitely recommend it! Well done, Ketchapp! However, I have one tiny problem. I'll be playing, about to get my high score, and then an ad will come up and stop the whole game. When I click no to the ad, I don't have enough time to recover and get back into the game, and I'll die! Please make it so that any ads come before or after a game is played!

author: Pat Gamer
comment: Try this addicting game! Try to beat your high score over & over again!!! Tip: Try to git as many gems as you can! (Probably around the 400 range.) Because if you have more gems, you can buy more marbles for you collection, and still have gems left over! ;-)
title: Great game! 8/10

author: Mikayah Campbell
comment: Everytime I play it for the first time it doesn't move and then it suddenly moves and makes me lose the game also there is a lot of adverts that keep on showing up
title: Gets stuck a lot and lots of ads

author: Sarah Reed
comment: If you're going to have ads during gameplay, at least give it a three second pause after clicking out of the ad. I click out of it and the ball just starts rolling. It's unfair! 😠
title: Ads

author: Osiris Maldonado
comment: Great time waster. It's one of the simplest games I've seen in the PlayStore, and yet challenging and fun to play! Unlike other similar apps which tend to be a bit frustrating after a while, this one keeps you tapping the "Retry" button.
title: Simple, casual, addictive fun!

author: Caroline Barritt
comment: Playing the game is a waste of time, the ball moves at such a ridiculously fast speed that it leaves the player an impossible chance of reacting in time to change direction even once, never mind changing direction multiple times every fraction of a second!. Absolutely daft.
title: Impossible to play

author: Salynnalexs
comment: There is no point to this game at all! Besides falling off and dying repeatingly! But if you find that fun, then. Go ahead waist your time. Its pointless! And plus when I got on the game ads would not stop popping up! Especially when I was trying to play the game! Addictive but retarded!!!!!
title: Wtf

author: RC Rockarollacola
comment: I'd like to see multiple paths, like one extra every once in a while. Maybe the second path could be more narrow and instead of pink Dimonds ,maybe black worth double on the narrow path and that path adventually leads back to the main wider path.
title: Fun little game
